section.title: Installation
section.screen:
pkg_add -r mysql55-server pkg_add -r mysql55-client pkg_add -r mysql55-scripts
/usr/local/bin/mysql_install_db chown -R mysql /var/db/mysql/ chgrp -R mysql /var/db/mysql/ /usr/local/bin/mysqld_safe -user=mysql & /usr/local/bin/mysqladmin -u root password ‘newpassword’
mysql_enable="YES"
